name: Stairway to nowhere
description:
This game was developed by the group Tardes da Júlia for the second MasterJam.

Hope you enjoy it!

(If any of the assets are missing credits, please leave on the comments, I'll gladly add you to the credits.)

Controls:

A and D- Move left and right

Space- Jump

E- Toggle placement mode

Right mouse button- Place block

Left mouse button- Hit block/ resources

P- Pause game

1, 2, 3- Switch between the corresponding blocks (Dirt, Wood, Rock)
